game.name: VÖLUND
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The forge remembers every strike. In VÖLUND, a blacksmithing roguelike, you shape raw ore into weapons of legend. Unearth cursed metals, master the ancient craft, and forge your path to immortality.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The forge remembers every strike. In VÖLUND, a blacksmithing roguelike, you shape raw ore into weapons of legend. Unearth cursed metals, master the ancient craft, and forge your path to immortality.
